select h.hotel_id, hotel_star, hotel_name, image_link, rev_cnt, com_cnt FROM (select DISTINCT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY hotel.HOTEL_STAR DESC) as "row",hotel_id, hotel_star, hotel_name from hotel) h, (select * from hotel_image where image_type = 'MAIN') i, (select hotel_id, count(*) as rev_cnt from reservation group by hotel_id) r, (select hotel_id, count(*) as com_cnt from review group by hotel_id) c where i.hotel_id = h.hotel_id and h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id(+) and h.hotel_id = c.hotel_id(+)
and "row" <= 4
order by "row"
